DOC.brief_summary: We compare effect HyD ( 25-hydroxyvitamin D ) vitamin D3 effect 25-hydroxyvitamin D plasma level course 4 month . This pharmacokinetic study include 35 postmenopausal woman . - Trial medicinal product
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study : Effect 25 ( OH ) D Vitamin D3 Serum 25 ( OH ) D
DOC.detailed_description: We include postmenopausal woman age 50 75 , race/ethnicity : Caucasian , serum 25 ( OH ) D baseline 20 60 nmol/l , body mass index : < 30 kg/m2 compare 25 ( OH ) D vitamin D3 equimolar dos 4 month pharmacokinetic trial . The dosing arm daily , weekly , bolus
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Postmenopausal woman Age 50 75 year Body mass index 1829 kg/m2 25hydroxyvitamin D level 20 60 nmol/l Caucasian Generally healthy Exclusion criterion : Serum calcium > 2.6 nmol/L Use dietary supplement ( > 400 IU vitamin D per day , > 600 mg calcium per day ) Hypertension Diseases carry risk hypercalcemia Use drug interfere bone metabolism last 12 month ( bisphosphonates estrogen receptor modulators , PTH , calcitonin ) Oral HRT last 6 month Extreme diet Fracture fall last 3 month Current smoke alcohol abuse Planning sunny vacation course trial Kidney stone history Creatinine clearance < 30 ml/min Comedications : anticoagulant , PTH , corticosteroid , thiazide diuretic , digoxin , anticonvulsant , malabsorption , z C
